html:
4.26.20  1:31 am   What is time

      you

4.26.20  1:22 am   What do you dream about at night

      the day

4.26.20  1:21 am   is breakfast real

      yes. it's lunch

4.26.20  1:09 am   Do you live on earth

      oh that would explain a lot

4.26.20  1:01 am   I feel like my life has been slipping out of control lately but i don't remember when it was ever in control. Do you feel like your life is ever in control?

     yes

     Or is it just perpetually chaotic

      not chaotic, but overwhelming sometimes

4.26.20  12:00 am   Does your sound "alien crickets" have a fixed pitch, or does it change based on its context? (i feel like the answer should be obvious, but right now I'm feeling too lazy to check it myself)

      i have to play the pitches i want, and it's more complicated than that, for best results i am actually supposed to play it with 2 hands, not an octave apart but a minor 7th apart. sure i could just program it to double up that way but that would be bad luck and it wouldn't have that sound of haste and panic

4.25.20  11:57 pm   do you know your mtbi type? if so, what is it?

      normal

4.25.20  11:52 pm   why do we dream?

      just to get a nice daily dose of common sense

4.25.20  10:54 pm   favorite altered state of consciousness?

      POWERFUL

4.25.20  10:28 pm   how big is Russia? 

      only vlademir putin truly knows the answer

4.25.20  10:13 pm   Why did my dog bark in the middle of the night?

      might have seen a person with unexpected looking hands

4.25.20  10:09 pm   how is your music so good?

      that could be the result of a couple of conspiracies i've done

4.25.20  9:50 pm   what species is damien maymdien? is he really just a balloon?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.25.20  9:28 pm   Thoughts on A# rather than Bb

      it usually means there are more sharps than flats in the surrounding environment

4.25.20  9:22 pm   your opinion on interrobangs‽

      the name for it usually overshadows the symbol itself

4.25.20  8:47 pm   can soap solve problems

      only if the problem happens to be germs and dirtyness

4.25.20  8:45 pm   What are you learning to do?

      what i do

4.25.20  8:12 pm   is mars red or brown?

      tan

4.25.20  7:16 pm   What is existence?

      could be you

4.25.20  7:09 pm   How did you start using neon letters n' stuff

      what the heck is a neon letter

4.25.20  6:33 pm   Who inspired you to do what you do now? 

      not who, everything

4.25.20  5:44 pm   Have you ever tried convincing NASA to fly you to the moon?

      no

4.25.20  5:42 pm   hope ur doing well i just wanted to let you know new canaan is one of my favorite songs. Do you prefer french fries or chips?

      in some places, french fries are chips

4.25.20  4:57 pm   why are you such a cool person,

     it is a binding contractual obligation

     or have you answered this in another question

     yes

      or perhaps a video?

     not directly

4.25.20  4:52 pm   favorite fish?

      the stair fish. looks just like a staircase. it uses the stairs to reproduce. pushes the babies down the stairs

4.25.20  4:47 pm   What do you think about the drums?

      could come in handy

4.25.20  4:43 pm   What was the inspiration behind the song "Stuck In A Rut"?

      feeling unable to create songs

4.25.20  4:40 pm   What does a box

      Contain

4.25.20  4:39 pm   Do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky?

      that sounds like something from the future

4.25.20  4:20 pm   ok so crazy story, i looked thru your website and I saw sheet music for "la de da de da de da de day oh" published before i was even born??
how many pieces have you written and not recorded yet? like a lot??

      several hundred

4.25.20  4:06 pm   how can you answer questions 24/7

     that would be impossible

     like do you just never sleep or are you actually a robot or something or both

     neither

4.25.20  4:01 pm   Are you going to do a welcome back video talking about what you have been learning?

      no

4.25.20  4:00 pm   "this is a song for my next album", but did it take all freakin day or less than 24 hours?

      it was composed on different days, i believe it was 3 small sessions, over a span of many years

4.25.20  3:57 pm   how does canada make you feel?

      good

4.25.20  3:54 pm   can't find my previous question

      is it this one

4.25.20  3:16 pm   how do i type?

      can't. typing is cancelled. the computer will figure out what you want to say based on your past purchases

4.25.20  3:01 pm   which one of your videos is your favorite?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.25.20  2:56 pm   What kind of things you believe that exists in area 51?

      cool planes

4.25.20  2:30 pm   It's so weird, you spend time every single day for years giving non-answers to non-questions. This is essentially a huge waste of time. You might argue everything we ever do also is, but for a neurotic craft-obsessed freak like you, it's strange to me that you waste all this time.

      being neurotic and craft-obsessed could be exactly why i would be obsessed with finding answers to absolutely every possible question than anyone may throw at me. many of which by the way are not 'non-questions', nor are the answers 'non-answers', but you conveniently left that out of your story

4.25.20  2:25 pm   the most useful use for mayo?

      give a nice smooth coating to the entire surface of the planet. a good starting point

4.25.20  2:04 pm   Are you the creator of the universe?

      i thought you were

4.25.20  1:55 pm   What's the point in doing anything 

      could make something happen

      scientists are trying to figure out

4.25.20  1:04 pm   4.22.20  4:40 pm

Do you use any sort of transient detection (sharp beginning of sound) or just go by your own ear?

      ear

4.25.20  12:53 pm   favorite artist?

      could be you

4.25.20  12:41 pm   How to make pasta

      have you tried yelling at it (nicely)

4.25.20  12:31 pm   regarding the fast keyboard(?) solos in some of your songs (la de da, might quit) - how much of them are planned in advance, versus improv'd?

      only the parts that use the melody of the song (i.e. "where did all the good times go", .."it's the first day of school", etc) are known. the rest is improv. that's the only way to get the good stuff

4.25.20  12:28 pm   what do you think of sand

      bland

4.25.20  12:27 pm   Is music a good or a service? 

      extremely both

      soup
